sentence.Network_en: Overproduction and consequent low market prices for wine caused economic tremors.
sentence.Network_cn: 葡萄酒生产过剩及由此造成的市价低迷引起了经济波动。

sentence.Network_en: The changes in social work consequent upon reorganization have been considerable.
sentence.Network_cn: 重组引起社会福利工作发生了重大变化。

sentence.Network_en: the lowering of taxes and the consequent increase in spending
sentence.Network_cn: 税收降低与随之引起的消费增长

PerfectNetExp.abs: TOEFL词频表 - 豆丁网 ... consequence n. 结果；后果 consequent 随之发生的 consequently 合乎逻辑的.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... consequence 结论；推论 consequent 条件；后项 conservation of energy 能量守恒.
console中文 ... 监控通道 Supervision channel... consequent 随之发生的,必然的 console 控制台.
一个模式:后件(Consequent)又称右部(Right — Hand — Side，RHS)，是规则触发时将要执行的一系列行为。

list.abs: consanguinity 岩浆同源consequent divide 顺向分水岭consequent river 顺向河
工业装备的“后果分析”（Consequence Analysis ）是一种定量估计工业装备失效后果严重程度的方法，该文主要介绍这种后果分析方 …
四六级高... ... in consequence of 因为…的缘故，由于 of consequence 重要的；有势力的 take the consequences 自食其果，承担责 …
四六级高... ... in consequence of 因为…的缘故，由于 of consequence 重要的；有势力的 take the consequences 自食其果，承担责 …
consequent ridge 顺向山脊consequent valley 顺向谷consequent 继起的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin consequent- 'overtaking, following closely', from the verb consequi

entry.tran: 因之而起的;作为结果的
entry.def: Consequent means happening as a direct result of an event or situation.

example.ex: The warming of the Earth and the consequent climatic changes affect us all...
example.tran: 地球变暖以及随之而来的气候变化影响着我们所有人。

example.ex: The changes in social work consequent upon reorganization have been considerable.
example.tran: 重组引起社会福利工作发生了重大变化。

means.word_mean: 1. following as an effect or result;

sentences.sentence: "the period of tension and consequent need for military preparedness"
"the health of the plants and the resulting flowers"

auth_sentence.res_content: Height above the sea and consequent rarity of the air.

means.word_mean: 作为结果的, 随之发生的

sentences.en: This fall of prices is consequent on the rise in production.
sentences.cn: 这次价格下降是生产提高的结果。

jushi.english: Competition in the market has led to goods being produced cheaply and a consequent deterioration in quality.
jushi.chinese: 市场上的竞争导致了商品的廉价生产,随之质量也下降了。

jushi.english: This fall of prices is consequent on the rise in production.
jushi.chinese: 这次价格下降是生产提高的结果。

jushi.english: His financial embarrassment is consequent upon his careless spending.
jushi.chinese: 他经济上的困难是由于胡乱花钱造成的。
